name: Next.js + Sentry (Server Actions Tracing)
description: Server Actionsも含めたSentryトレーシングの最小構成。

files.template:
import * as Sentry from '@sentry/nextjs';
Sentry.init({ dsn: process.env.SENTRY_DSN, tracesSampleRate: 1.0 });

'use server';
export async function slow(){ await new Promise(r=>setTimeout(r, 50)); return { ok: true }; }
